name: Industry, Baby!
description:
You’re a shift manager on an 18th century assembly line at the Stuff&Co factory. Manage your employees with unmatched punctuality to impress the owners and get a bonus, or get fired for producing sub-par stuff.

How to play the game?

Activate an employee when an item reaches their station.  Be carful of overworking a product!

Use the corresponding button for each employee:

Q - Quentine Quambly

W - Winston Wedgeward

E - Eddy Edmondson

Credits:

Code - Alon Tzarafi, Dave

Sound Design - Dave

Art - Yuval Albag, Shalev bli yud
